lead_paragraph: In the day following Russian tennis star Maria Sharapova's admission that she failed a drug test, sponsors Nike, Porsche and Swiss watchmaker Tag Heuer dropped her like a hot potato.

headline.print_headline: Sharapova Fallout Shows Sponsors Have No Tolerance for Banned Drugs
headline.main: Sharapova Fallout Shows Sponsors Have No Tolerance for Banned Drugs

snippet: In the day following Russian tennis star Maria Sharapova's admission that she failed a drug test, sponsors Nike, Porsche and Swiss watchmaker Tag Heuer dropped her like a hot potato....
